name: What's With All The Cats?
description:
"What's with all the Cats?" is a short narrative game created using the Bitsy Game Maker engine. I banged this out over the course of a few hours during my 9-5 because the job is so mind-numbingly tedious.

I hope you get just a sliver of enjoyment out of this.

There's only one question left to ask...Just why is there so many cats?
